cs35013s.view

Class A_Mapper<_DESCRIPTOR_ extends A_Descriptor<?,?,?,?>,_AXIS_ extends cs35013s.datatype.I_WorldCoordinatable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs35013s.view.A_Mapper<_DESCRIPTOR_,_AXIS_>
  • Type Parameters:
    _DESCRIPTOR_ - - the descriptor type
    _AXIS_ - - the axis type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapperAltitude, MapperLatitude, MapperLongitude

    public abstract class A_Mapper<_DESCRIPTOR_ extends A_Descriptor<?,?,?,?>,_AXIS_ extends cs35013s.datatype.I_WorldCoordinatable>
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the shared elements of a mapper, which translates coordinates between a view and the world.
    Author:
    Dan Tappan [05.05.13]

      • mapDistance

        public abstract int mapDistance(_DESCRIPTOR_ descriptor,
              _AXIS_ distance)
        Maps a world distance to a pixel distance. This is similar to mapCoordinate(), but it does not consider the origin.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - - the descriptor
        distance - - the world distance
        Returns:
        the pixel distance

      • mapDistance
